nodes.text: The FD4 fighting droid was a model of gladiator droid with a brown cylindrical body topped by a disc shaped head with a large black sensor. A modified FD4 fighting droid was made to fight in the droid arena of the Lodge on the planet Vandor. In 10 BBY, it was set to fight against the FD3 fighting droid FD3-MN, but the match was interrupted by the droid L3-37 who tried to convince the FD4 not to fight while the arena manager Ralakili shouted at her.

A FD4 fighting droid first appeared in the 2018 Anthology Series film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. The droid was not named in the film, but was identified in the video "Every Droid in Star Wars", which was posted on StarWarsKids.com in 2019.
